Medium-KOR-Conditional-1.description: Clear the Comms Tower facility on Brightsands of hostile creature

Medium-KOR-Conditional-2.description: Kill a rival prospector at the Bright Sands East Collection Point

Medium-KOR-Conditional-3.description: Kill hostile creatures at the Bright Sands Dig Site and retrieve Nickel

Medium-KOR-Conditional-4.description: Clear the Bright Sands Vaccine Labs of hostile creatures and retrieve their Spinal Bases

NEW-Easy-KOR-Gather-1.description: There you are Prospector. We need you to bring us Compound Sheets so we can reinforce the metal supports of one of our old mines on Fortuna III.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Gather-2.description: We need Ball Bearings to build new mining machinery. Go get us some!

NEW-Easy-KOR-Gather-3.description: One of our drop ships was damaged by the Storm. We need Magnetic Field Stabilizers and Polymetallic Prefabricate for the repairs.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Gather-4.description: We are producing new Mining Tools for new Prospectors and need Hydraulic Pistons and Hardened Metals for it. You know what to do.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-1.description: One of our mines collapsed with valuable equipment inside. Bring us Derelict Explosives so we can blast it free!

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-2.description: Our engineers have designed an autonomous mining bot. Bring us a Zero Systems CPU and some Ball Bearings for the prototype.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-3.description: Prospector. We need Toxic Glands. Don't ask questions, just go acquire some and bring them back with maximum discretion.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-4.description: My personal ship needs some... comfort improvements. Bring me Magnetic Field Stabilizers, Compound Sheets and Polymetallic Prefabricate.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-5.description: Prospector! The Zero Systems CPU you brought us for the mining bot was not powerful enough. We'll need a Master Unit CPU instead.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-1.description: The suspension on our mining excavators need improvements to handle rocky terrain. We need Multitools, Ball Bearings and Hydraulic Pistons.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-2.description: Our scientists are confident they can create a new, extremely durable alloy from Hardened Bone Plates and Compound Sheets! Bring us what we need.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-3.description: We will have to build new turrets to help protect our mining sites and landing pads. Bring us Zero Systems CPUs and Hardened Metals.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-4.description: Veltecite supplies are low, but we need energy! Get your hands on one of those fabled ICA Miniature Reactors and deliver it to us. Discreetly.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-5.description: Prospector! We need Derelict Explosives, Master Unit CPUs and Compound Sheets. Dont ask questions, just go acquire the materials.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Mine-1.description: We are running out of Flawed Veltecite, one of our lower-grade energy sources. Bring us some more!

NEW-Easy-KOR-Mine-2.description: Ah, there you are! We need Brittle Titan Ore, Prospector. Don't ask questions, just get us some.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Mine-3.description: Prospector. You have proven more useful than expected. Now go get us some Altered Nickel for our foundries.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Mine-4.inGameName: Cloudy with a Chance of Laser
NEW-Easy-KOR-Mine-4.description: We are once more in need of your skills, Prospector. This time, we need Cloudy Veltecite for the construction of a new Laser Drill.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Mine-1.description: The Veltecite you brought us the other day is already spent. We need more energy! Get us some Clear Veltecite this time!

NEW-Medium-KOR-Mine-and-PvE-2.description: One of our miners searching the Jungle for Focus Crystals was wounded by creatures. Go clear the area, and bring back Focus Crystals they should have.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Mine-3.description: The Clear Veltecite was an improvement, we gained much more energy from it, but we need more! See if you can get your hands on some Pure Veltecite.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Mine-4.description: Scouts have found Titan Ore deposits on Fortuna III! Go see if the rumours are true and bring us samples. And some Altered Nickel, while you're at it.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Mine-5.description: We're working on a new type of laser for our latest mining platforms. For the lenses, we will need Clear Veltecite and Focus Crystals. Off you go!

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-1.description: You got time for a job, Prospector? The samples you brought us weren't pure enough. Get us Pure Veltecite and some Pure Focus Crystals this time.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-2.description: Hm. Interesting. The Pure Focus Crystals you brought us worked perfectly for the new lenses. Bring us more! I can already taste Osiris' envy.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-3.description: Bring us some Veltecite Hearts, the highest purity of Veltecite, for us to experiment on.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-4.description: We are prototyping a new laser rifle that can penetrate even Crusher skulls. Get us Focus Crystals and Pure Focus Crystals for the lenses.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-5.description: Ah, Prospector. We need Clear Veltecite and Derelict Explosives for an experiment. I cannot say any more and expect utmost discretion.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Mine-6.description: Fine. I guess you need to know. We are trying to charge Veltecite with power, the same way the Storm does. Bring us more Veltecite Samples.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Hunt-1.description: Prospector, packs of Striders have been attacking our mining convoys! Go cull their numbers a bit.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Hunt-2.description: Time for you to show what you're capable of! Kill creatures using a pistol to prove your skills.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Hunt-1.description: Those damned Rattlers keep interfering with mining operations! Hunt some of them down, and use a Shotgun, make it brutal.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Hunt-2.description: The Dig Site, one of our most valuable excavations, has been overrun by creatures! You know what to do, now go!

NEW-Medium-KOR-Hunt-3.description: One of our excavators was just ripped to shreds by ferocious creatures, the kind known as "Marauders". I don't care how you do it, but hunt them down!

NEW-Hard-KOR-Hunt-1.description: According to Intel, a ship with valuable Osiris tech crashed in the Jungle. Go clear the area of Rattlers so our troops can loot the wreck!

NEW-Medium-KOR-PvP-1.description: Prospector! It's time to test Korolev Weaponry against human targets. Grab a Korolev Weapon and eliminate rival Prospectors.

NEW-Hard-KOR-PvP-1.description: Greedy Prospectors have been filling their own pockets with valuable minerals from our Dig Site. Go eliminate any Prospector there, send a message!

NEW-Hard-KOR-PvP-2.description: Some are saying Korolev is afraid of conflict! Get that idea out of their heads! Take out rival Prospectors, let them know Korolev sent you!

NEW-Hard-KOR-PvP-3.description: Prospector, marketing department wants more test data to sell our superior weapons; go take out rival Prospectors with Korolev Weapons!

NEW-Hard-KOR-PvP-4.description: Habitat Civil Protection doesn't believe our guns are worth the price; take out some rival Prospectors with a Korolev Pistol and Shotgun to shut them up!

NEW-Hard-KOR-PvP-5.description: KBR Longshot sales need a boost back home; let's show them what a Korolev rifle can do to Marauders and Prospectors!

NEW-Medium-KOR-Meteor-1.description: We have received reports of incredibly powerful Meteor Shards unpredictably dropping onto Fortuna in spectacular Meteor Showers. Go get us some!

NEW-Hard-KOR-Meteor-1.description: Prospector! Osiris seems to have gotten their hands on a Meteor Core from the main Meteor of a Meteor Shower. We need one as well!

NEW-Hard-KOR-Meteor-2.description: These Meteor Shards are incredibly valuable. We can use them to power our mining machinery. Bring us more, Prospector.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Meteor-3.description: Prospector, we have developed a new type of Battery based on Meteor Cores that will fuel a drop ship or excavator for years. You know what to do!

NEW-Easy-KOR-Stash-1.description: For excavations, we need you to stash a Heavy Mining Tool in one of Badums Dead Drop Containers underground at East Collection Point. You'll find it.

NEW-Easy-KOR-Stash-2.description: Ah, there you are. Search for the Dead Drop Container at the Swamp Skeleton and stash some Ball Bearings in there. Our miners need them for field repairs.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Stash-1.description: Prospector. Acquire some Derelict Explosives and go stash them in the specified Dead Drop at Comms Tower. Be discrete about it, and no questions.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Stash-2.description: Prospector. Go deposit a Hammer Pistol in a Dead Drop at Base Camp for one of our Agents on Fortuna. They will take care of the rest.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Stash-3.description: Our Comms are jammed. We need you to stash a Magnetic Field Stabilizer at each of the three Base Camp Dead Drops, Main Office, Gate A and Gate C.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Stash-4.description: Prospector. Get down there and stash a PKR Maelstrom Shotgun and some Ammo at the Comms Tower for one of our Field Agents. And be discrete about it.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Stash-1.description: One of our Miners has been injured and is hiding near Base Camp. Go stash a Rare Shield for them there and clear the area of creatures.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Stash-2.description: We want to take over an ICA Data Center. Stash a Master Unit CPU at the Server Room so that our Tech Staff can use it to splice the System.

Main-KOR-FTUE-1.description: "Ah, a new Prospector! Korolev Heavy Industries will always have work for you... but maybe for now we start small. Find us some Nickel Prospector!"
Main-KOR-FTUE-1.chainDescription: Korolev Heavy Industries, the system's industrial powerhouse... and near monopoly. The megacorp came to Fortuna III early to exploit its resources, and sticks around now to make sure its claims don't lapse. Plus, they keep the lights on up here, for a nice profit. They want you to perform some simple tasks to prove your mettle. Don't disappoint!

Main-KOR-GainTrust-1.description: "Good, good. You have seen the Striders on the surface, yes? Nasty things; show me you know how to deal with them."

Main-KOR-GainTrust-2.description: "Some of our older machinery requires replacement parts to keep working. Maybe you can find us some on the surface, save us making new ones..."

Main-KOR-GainTrust-3.description: "We plan to send a team down to the old Bright Sands Water Facility to salvage some special parts, but too many creatures nest there now. Go clear it the area out, OK?"

Main-KOR-GainTrust-4.description: "We need some Circuit Boards... for a delicate matter. You need to find us some Flawed Veltecite, for the record, but don't forget those Circuit Boards!"

Main-KOR-MiningTool-1.description: "A large order has come in for raw materials. Time to put that pickaxe to good use!"
Main-KOR-MiningTool-1.chainDescription: Tired of swinging that pickaxe yet? Want a new mining tool that'll turn those rocks to dust in just a few short seconds? Korolev's got you covered, if you complete these simple tasks for them.

Main-KOR-MiningTool-2.description: "There's a new Mining Tool to make your life easier, Prospector. But building one requires parts we can't spare at the moment. Here, get us these so we can continue work."
Main-KOR-MiningTool-2.chainDescription: Tired of swinging that pickaxe yet? Want a new mining tool that'll turn those rocks to dust in just a few short seconds? Korolev's got you covered, if you complete these simple tasks for them.

Main-KOR-MiningTool-3.description: "Show me that you know how to use a real, proper tool, Prospector! Use one of our guns to take down some Rattlers."
Main-KOR-MiningTool-3.chainDescription: Tired of swinging that pickaxe yet? Want a new mining tool that'll turn those rocks to dust in just a few short seconds? Korolev's got you covered, if you complete these simple tasks for them.

Main-KOR-MiningTool-4.description: "We're missing some parts, but can't move them on the station without raising eyebrows. Get these items to the Swamp on Bright Sands."
Main-KOR-MiningTool-4.chainDescription: Tired of swinging that pickaxe yet? Want a new mining tool that'll turn those rocks to dust in just a few short seconds? Korolev's got you covered, if you complete these simple tasks for them.

Main-KOR-MiningTool-5.description: "Good news bad news situation. Our prototype works, but it needs much stronger materials. Get us these, Prospector."
Main-KOR-MiningTool-5.chainDescription: Tired of swinging that pickaxe yet? Want a new mining tool that'll turn those rocks to dust in just a few short seconds? Korolev's got you covered, if you complete these simple tasks for them.

Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.description: "Some journalists have talked their way through all the red tape and will be getting a tour of the old Dig Site soon. Soften up the area for them, I don't trust their security team alone will be up for the task."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-1.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-2.description: "A new factory robot malfunctioned and took out another's eyes. It's best we don't advertise the accident, so get us replacement parts from the surface."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-2.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-3.description: "One of our Researchers thinks mixing Pure Veltecite with Titan Ore can increase reactor efficiency. Get us what she needs to prove that theory."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-3.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-4.description: "Defoaming reports show a big decline in our weapons landing the final blow, it makes Korolev look bad. Make sure other Prospectors understand Korolev is superior."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-4.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-5.description: "A shipping accident damaged a crate full of Scrappers already marked for sale. Get us these parts so we can repair them before it becomes an issue."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-5.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-6.description: "The Bright Sands Jungle area has an overpopulation problem, maybe you can be the solution?"
Main-KOR-GruntWork-6.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-7.description: "Osiris are doing experiments with Meteor Fragments and Focus Crystals. Get us some samples, I want to find out what's so interesting..."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-7.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-GruntWork-8.description: "Marauders are made of something much tougher than Striders. Kill one and bring back some of its remains, for testing."
Main-KOR-GruntWork-8.chainDescription: Now that you're part of the Korolev family, it's time to put some real work in. Korolev would send down its own teams to retrieve resources, but the planet's status as "Extremely Hazardous to Life" makes that slightly illegal. Plus, what kind of person would be crazy enough to go down there, anyway?

Main-KOR-Veltecite-1.description: "Ah, Prospector, this will interest you. We think we can modify a Scanner to zero in on Veltecite; get us these parts so we can build a protype."
Main-KOR-Veltecite-1.chainDescription: Veltecite fuels Prospect Station's power generators, foundries, engines, and is its main export. The few mineral deposits exposed to the surface can generally be found near water, but tracking one down can be time consuming, and dangerous. Wouldn't it be nice to have an easier and faster way to get to it? Fortunately Korolev has a few techs working on just the thing.

Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.description: "One of our top engineers believes Prospectors are using radios on the surface to affect his dreams. It's absurd, but he's irreplaceable. Do this and maybe he'll think you took care of them..."
Main-KOR-TitanOre-1.chainDescription: All those ships and stations Korolev is known for? Titan Ore. It's as strong as it is precious, and also notoriously hard to find.  Help Korolev out to gain access to a new Scanner Attachement for it!

Main-KOR-TitanOre-2.description: "With that sorted, maybe he'll finally finish this project. Get us Titan Ore to test his new scanner mod, Prospector. A small price for progress, eh?"
Main-KOR-TitanOre-2.chainDescription: All those ships and stations Korolev is known for? Titan Ore. It's as strong as it is precious, and also notoriously hard to find.  Help Korolev out to gain access to a new Scanner Attachement for it!

Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.description: "We have a new Scanner mod in the works, one that can find Focus Crystals. We'll need some high purity samples for callibration."
Main-KOR-FocusCrystals-1.chainDescription: Focus Crystals are a staple in many new electronics, particularly those built in the Fortuna system. It would be nice if some of those electronics could help with locating them, and with the right materials the techs at Korolev might have just the thing.

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.description: "A civy retrieval team operating in Crescent Falls brought back the remains of an old miner. That wouldn't normally concern us, but they were covered in solidified Letium, at room temperature... We have a log of the sites they visited before expiring, check them out for us."
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-1.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.description: "The Federal Authority is upgrading some of its arsenal, and they've taken interest in our PKR Maelstrom. Take one down to the planet and gather some good real-use stats with it for us, OK?"
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-2.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-3.description: "We need our science team to check these sites, but we can't send a full escort detail without being noticed. Clear the areas out, make it safe for our people to continue their work."
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-3.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-4.description: "The ICA has started inspecting every ship coming back from the surface, "for security purposes". They know we're onto something... Our team on the planet will need supplies to keep working, it's up to you to deliver them."
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-4.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5.description: Our team still can't get out, but their research can. Find an Uplink station, your credentials should get us the data they've stored in the surface network.
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-5.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-6.description: "ICA are only inspecting arrivals from Crescent Falls, so our team on the planet needs supplies to hike to Bright Sands and evac from there. They've identified  what they need at these locations; clear them out so they can move in safely."
Main-KOR-LetiumRumors-6.chainDescription: Stable Letium? It's an important discovery; the compound has so far only been collected as a volatile, quickly decaying gas, and it's not exactly safe to handle. What little has been collected so far revolutionized Veltecite refining, having a stable source of both would be massive... for Korolev's profits. Definitely worth investigating!

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.description: "Creatures from the Jungle are still bleeding into nearby sites. Thin their numbers."
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-1.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-2.description: "A group of delegates from a trading partner will be visiting us soon, and they always expect gifts. See if you can find something shiny for them."
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-2.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.description: "Our small arms team is working on iterations to new SMG type weapons and could do with more real world data. Give them a good show."
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-3.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.description: "One of our agents operating in Bright Sands needs to replace their equipment. Stash these items at the Base Camp for them."
Main-KOR-FirstExtraWork-4.chainDescription: Those science people may be busy trying to understand what it is they just discovered, but there's always more work a resourceful prospector like you can do to keep Korolov on top.

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.description: "Our researchers on the station have been analyzing the data you retrieved, and have requested a few items to speed things up. I suggest checking old Osiris labs, I'm sure they won't mind."
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-1.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.description: "It seems some creatures have higher concentrations of Letium than others... My people want some very specific samples now: head to the abandoned Dig Site mine in Bright Sands and hunt down what you can."
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-2.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-3.description: "We haven't heard from our ground team in days... The Cycle is stronger in the wilds, their equipment may have malfunctioned. Take this Radio Equipment down to Bright Sands stashes; with luck we're right and they'll make contact!"
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-3.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-4.description: "We've contacted an Osiris scientist willing to switch to help with our Letium research, but they'll only take payment in Veltecite, off the books. Deliver some to this Dead Drop on Crescent Falls."
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-4.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-5.description: "Our team made it back home! It will be a while before they can get back to work... why not take some time and let everyone Korolev is still king of the hill?"
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-5.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-6.description: "Our people have been able to extract stable Letium from biological samples, but they need more to test with. Hunt down some more creatures, for science."
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-6.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-7.description: "We've narrowed down the process that allows these creatures to absorb and stabilize Letium. Get us more samples, we're close to a breakthrough!"
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-7.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-8.description: "Our research is nearly complete! Now we just need you to use the Uplink facilities on Crescent Falls; we should be able to use recent surface scans of the area to locate Letium vents."
Main-KOR-LetiumResearch-8.chainDescription: A lot of questions remain about how to stabilize Letium for safe and easy exploitation; with what's already been recovered and studied, Letium could be used not just to refine Veltecite, but trigger all sorts of other reactions in more common materials. Help Korolev with what they need and their discoveries might even surpass the brains at Osiris!

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.description: "The synthetics team is close to a breakthrough on a lighter and more durable fabric, but they've run out of basic resources. We can't wait for a restock, get them what they need."
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-1.chainDescription: Few tools are more important to a prospector than a good backpack, and the prize for helping Korolev with a few extra tasks might even be described as 'Epic'.

Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.description: "Excellent... now we just need enough raw materials for a sample run. Getting these shouldn't be an issue for you, right?"
Main-KOR-CraftingBackpack-2.chainDescription: Few tools are more important to a prospector than a good backpack, and the prize for helping Korolev with a few extra tasks might even be described as 'Epic'.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.description: "Extracting Letium from the surface will require heavy machinery. Heavy, durable, machinery, like the old Veltecite Laser Drills. Get us these materials, Prospector, and we can begin crafting a good frame for our new drilling platform."
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-1.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-2.description: "Something different this time... We need efficiency data on Shotgun style weapons to help improve our own. This shouldn't take you long, I hope."
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-2.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-3.description: "Our hunt for parts continues. Ordering these off the market would take forever, and attract too much attention. Thankfully, we have you!"
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-3.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-4.description: "Our Osiris "friend" is expecting another payment to continue their services. See that they get what they want."
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-4.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-5.description: "Our drilling platform is nearly complete! Now we just need parts for its laser drill... It won't be of much use without it!"
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-5.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-6.description: "Our Osiris scientist plans to leave Fortuna, and is holding back the final key details needed to fully stabilize Letium until their last payment! You'll need to get me what they want, quick!"
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-6.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-7.description: "We have to hold on our efforts, Osiris suspects we're to blame for one of their top people suddenly quitting. I imagine they'll ease off if they see your efforts on the planet are purely unscientific."
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-7.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-8.description: "The Laser Drill needs something with more kick than even Veltecite. Get us some Meteor Cores, that should be enough for our first drill!"
Main-KOR-BuildLaserDrill-8.chainDescription: Time to build a machine capable of safely (well, relatively) extracting and processing Flaked Letium from the surface. Fortunately Korolev used to operate Mobile Mining Platforms, giant laser drills that would float through the peaceful skies of Fortuna III in search of mineral veins to exploit. The days those things could be safely operated are long gone, but they're just the thing we need now to mine for Letium, with some assistance on the ground.

Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.description: "One of our researchers is concerned that Crushers are an unstoppable force that could easily wreck our mining platforms. I'm sure you can prove them wrong!"
Main-KOR-KillCrusher-1.chainDescription: Crushers aren't known for their curiosity, or really anything other than very efficiently crushing things, which on the off chance they pay a visit to a Laser Drill, it's best we all know you're up to the task of taking one down. Good hunting, Prospector!

Main-KOR-TestRun-1.description: "Finally! Our first Laser Drill is fully operational, and you get to test it! Locate a Letium vent, plant a beacon, and operate the platform. Return to me once you have our prize!"
Main-KOR-TestRun-1.chainDescription: With the Laser Drill complete, it's up to you to test it out and finally retrieve some Letium for Korolev. Remember to be careful, that thing will draw a lot of unwanted attention during descent, and it'll take a while to produce results!

Main-KOR-Unique-1.description: "Ah, just the prospector I needed! We need you to go back to the Dig Site, it seems there are some... matters that need to be handled before those journalists arrive for their tour. Some of the site's workers refused to follow evacuation procedures and the creatures got to them before our rescue teams; we'd like you to retrieve their cameras, to protect their dignity."

Main-KOR-Unique-2.description: "Prospector! We believe we've located where our Letium-covered friend was working, and our records show that at the time he was with one of our best mudloggers. Head out and find their remains, there might be something to this!"

Main-KOR-Unique-3.description: "Our new scientist friend believes Osiris was already researching the presence of Letium in various creatures. Head to their main lab on Bright Sands and bring back whatever samples they were studying."

Main-KOR-Unique-4.description: "There's not point in reinventing the wheel! Head out to the crashed Laser Drill on Bright Sands, there should still be some tech we can salvage to use for our prototype drill, it would save us a lot of time... and money."

NEW-Hard-KOR-LaserDrill-1.description: Alright Prospector; gear up and go get us some more Letium. We will of course pay extra for the risks, as well as you absolute secrecy...

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-6.description: We need Brittle Titan Ore, Prospector. And lots of it! I trust you know where to look for it by now? As they say, this is not your first rodeo.

NEW-Hard-KOR-Gather-7.description: Prospector, get us some Shock Absorbers from the surface, our equipment here needs maintenance. Get us the parts, if they're Korolev they'll still work for sure! Well... probably.

NEW-Medium-KOR-Gather-6.description: There you are, finally! There's been an accident at one of our factories and we urgently require Old Medicine from the surface, hurry!
